mixed-citation.article-title: Polycladida (Platyhelminthes, Rhabditophora) from Cape Verde and related regions of Macaronesia

tp:treatment-sec.p: S„o Sebasti„o Isle, Brazil ( Marcus 1950 ); S„o Paulo, Brazil ( Marcus 1952 ); Antigua and Barbuda ; Curaç„o, Netherlands Antilles ; Isla de Aves, Venezuela ( Marcus & Marcus 1968 ).
Mindelo, S„o Vicente Island, Cape Verde .

The specimens of
Cycloporus gabriellae
captured in Cape Verde summarize the original description of
C. gabriellae
published by Marcus (1950) , but differ externally and in coloration from
C. gabriellae
of Cabo Frio, Brazil (
Bahia et al . 2014
). This is the first record in the eastern region of the Atlantic Ocean for the species.
